item.title: Blog customizer for pootle page builder
item.dc:creator: Nick Burne
item.description:
Post Customizer allows you to pull in posts to create stunning pages with beautiful post layouts. Watch the video to see how amazing it really is.

The post Blog customizer for pootle page builder< /a> appeared first on pootlepress.
item.content:encoded:
Post Customizer allows you to pull in posts to create stunning pages with beautiful post layouts. Watch the video to see how amazing it really is.

Features

With pootle page builder post customizer you can:

  • Create stunning pages featuring your posts with different layouts and options
  • Four beautiful layout options and more coming soon
  • Filter posts by category
  • Add post meta above title, below title or below excerpt

Support and upgrades

  • Premium support provided for 1 year based on the number of sites licensed
  • Free updates provided for 1 year for based on the number of sites licensed
  • Update within WordPress with a notification or download from your pootlepress store account

Walk-through Video

The post Blog customizer for pootle page builder appeared first on pootlepress.

item.title: Page customizer for pootle page builder
item.dc:creator: Jamie Marsland
item.description:
Page customizer gives you lots of controls to customize individual WordPress pages, including, Add fullscreen background image per page Add fullscreen background video per page Change header colour per page Change header background image per page Change footer colour per page Hide page title, header, breadcrumbs, sidebars and footer per page Change mobile background images […]

item.title: The One Pager for pootle page builder
item.dc:creator: Jamie Marsland
item.description:
The One Pager add on for pootle page builder makes creating long smooth scrolling websites super easy

The post The One Pager for pootle page builder appeared first on pootlepress.
item.content:encoded:
The One Pager for pootle page builder makes it easy and quick to create beautiful long scrolling wordpress pages

Features

With The One Pager for pootle page builder you can

  • Create smooth scrolling pages
  • Navigation icons get added automatically
  • Menu items are automatically added for you to use
  • No coding needed

Support and upgrades

  • Premium support provided for 1 year based on the number of sites licensed
  • Free updates provided for 1 year for based on the number of sites licensed
  • Update within WordPress with a notification or download from your PootlePress store account

Walk-through Video

 

The post The One Pager for pootle page builder appeared first on pootlepress.

item.title: WooCommerce for pootle page builder
item.dc:creator: Nick Burne
item.description:
pootle page builder for WooCommerce brings powerful WooCommerce features into page builder. With pootle page builder for WooCommerce you can create stunning pages featuring your products by id, category, attribute, best-selling, top rated and on-sale – plus you can use pootle page builder on product pages and with WooCommerce Tab Manager.

The post WooCommerce for pootle page builder appeared first on pootlepress.
item.content:encoded:
pootle page builder for WooCommerce brings powerful WooCommerce features into page builder.

Features

With pootle page builder for WooCommerce you can:

  • Create stunning pages featuring your products by id, category, attribute, best-selling, top rated and on-sale
  • Use pootle page builder on product pages
  • Use pootle page builder with WooCommerce Tab Manager

Support and upgrades

  • Premium support provided for 1 year based on the number of sites licensed
  • Free updates provided for 1 year for based on the number of sites licensed
  • Update within WordPress with a notification or download from your PootlePress store account

Walk-through Videos

1. Creating stunning pages using different combinations of products

2. Using pootle page builder for WooCommerce with product pages & WooCommerce Tab Manager

The post WooCommerce for pootle page builder appeared first on pootlepress.
